casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of AD.C. and Al.C., Minor Children, C.C., Sr., Father, and T.C., Mother Appellants-Respondents,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 45A04-1706-JT-1363 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed December 19, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BROWN , J.

Affirmed.

NAJAM, J., Concurs.

KIRSCH, J., Concurs.
